text: And from the people who says: "We believed by God." So if he was harmed mildly in God, he made/put the people`s test/torture as/like God`s torture, and if victory/aid came from your Lord, they will say (E): "That we were with you." Or is not God with more knowledgeable with what (is in) the creation`s all together`s/(universes) chests (innermosts)
